mapper.insert:
INSERT ALL
INTO APPROVAL_LINE (APPROVAL_LEVEL, APPROVAL_NO, USER_NO, TYPE, STATUS, CONFIRM_STATUS, APPROVAL_DATE, APPROVAL_LINE_TYPE) VALUES (#{line.approvalLevel}, #{line.approvalNo}, #{line.userNo}, #{line.type}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, SYSDATE, #{line.approvalLineType})
SELECT 1 FROM DUAL
